ygData.subject: Re: Hostage Situation
ygData.msgSnippet: And they ll kill him later if we don t, If this new Maximals taken hostage we ll all be helpless, we have to act now. Lunarpine knew thier chances were thin.

"And they'll kill him later if we don't, If this new Maximals taken 
hostage we'll all be helpless, we have to act now." Lunarpine knew 
thier chances were thin. A thin chance was the only chance, and the 
more guns they have firing at once the better thier chances of 
success. "I don't have time to explain everything to you, are you in 
or is it up to Wing and me?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus frowns as he hears Lunarpine. "That's insane. Those two 
will kill 
> Ramhorn the moment we open fire."
> 
> He takes a few steps forward, looking at Shuko as he hears his 
demands.
> 
> "And during those five days, you will not attack us as well?" he 
asks 
> carefully. If the answer was yes, then it would be a blessing for 
the 
> Maximals as well...
